org.apache.flink.storm.api

类 FlinkOutputFieldsDeclarer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.storm.api.FlinkOutputFieldsDeclarer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.storm.topology.OutputFieldsDeclarer

    final class FlinkOutputFieldsDeclarer
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.storm.topology.OutputFieldsDeclarer
    FlinkOutputFieldsDeclarer is used to get the declared output schema of a spout or bolt.

    CAUTION: Flink does not support direct emit.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  FlinkOutputFieldsDeclarer.DefaultComparable
      FlinkOutputFieldsDeclarer.DefaultComparable is a Comparable helper class that is used to get the correct TypeInformation from TypeExtractor within #getOutputType().

      • getOutputType

        TypeInformation<Tuple> getOutputType(java.lang.String streamId)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns TypeInformation for the declared output schema for a specific stream.
        参数:
        streamId - A stream ID.
        返回:
        output type information for the declared output schema of the specified stream; or null if streamId == null
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If no output schema was declared for the specified stream or if more then 25 attributes got declared.

      • getGroupingFieldIndexes

        int[] getGroupingFieldIndexes(java.lang.String streamId,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> groupingFields)
        Computes the indexes within the declared output schema of the specified stream, for a list of given field-grouping attributes.
        参数:
        streamId - A stream ID.
        groupingFields - The names of the key fields.
        返回:
        array of ints that contains the index within the output schema for each attribute in the given list
